Description: 1912. The United States has made world domination, and the floating city of Columbia, opened with great fanfare by the jubilation enthusiastic audience, has become a majestic symbol of American ideals. However, a promising venture soon turned into a disaster: for an unknown reason, the city suddenly disappeared in the sky-high given. America's greatest achievement has disappeared without a trace ... In this complete mystery stories play a central role to the former detective agency Pinkerton Booker DeWitt. He was sent to Colombia to track down and release some Elizabeth, for which the city of the future was flying a prison in childhood. Detective to mend the relationship with the girl, to the full extent of its use and its unusual ability - because out of Columbia, which is losing altitude every second (and therefore its collapse - only a matter of time), they will turn out just the two.
(+ / -) Features
"Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of the world in bright distinctive style of American industrialism, as embodied by the Unreal Engine 3.
"The decision of puzzles, the disclosure of sinister secrets and fighting for his life in a dizzying battles in the clouds - stay in Colombia did not name any boring or monotonous.
"Use at your own set of weapons and abilities very non-trivial characters.
"In a hostile world of the celestial Elizabeth will be your faithful partner. And let the game run its actions, it is necessary for you to become a real, live person.
"Love the ordeal and that it" as a truly "? So, it is addressed to you when high realism - "1999". Accept the challenge to developers - and you have to carefully weigh the "pros" and "cons" before making any decision. How should think over the line of the hero - remember that the possibility of his resurrection is limited, and any misstep could lead to a sudden end the game.
